resources.string: NOTE: This view printer is just for fun, please see logcat or file output to get a practical experience.
We need access external storage to save local crash files, please click allow to continue.
Crash printer is unavailable until you granted permission.
Emulated crash information is saved on %s.
WARNING: a log was intercepted due to its category or msg contains keyword %s.

This library is designed to be an useful android log tool.

Using this library can lead you away from duplicate and boring works, e.g. thinking of log tags, writing object params, and filtering large logs from which logged by colleagues.
